title: "EU decision to validate Venezuela’s fraudulent elections a slap in the face to democracy | Opinion"
excerpt: "I used to think that the 27-country European Union (EU) was a champion of democracy around the world. But the EU’s decision, in effect, to validate Venezuela’s fraudulent regional elections in November suggests that the European bloc has changed sides and now is in the business of legitimizing dictatorships."
